definition: all/both/entirely/(used for emphasis) even/already/(not) at all

sentences.english: The Silk Road always started from Loyang the ancient capital of China.
sentences.chinese: 絲綢之路一直是從中國的古都洛陽開始。

sentences.english: I am writing this in Xi’an, ancient capital of the Chinese empire.
sentences.chinese: 我正在中國古都西安撰寫此文。

sentences.english: A friend and I went in this year's tomb-sweeping day six dynasties-nanjing.
sentences.chinese: 我和朋友在今年的清明節去了六朝古都南京。

sentences.english: It is the landmark of the ancient capital city - Xian.
sentences.chinese: 大雁塔是古都西安的標誌建築。

sentences.english: With the ancient capital of Kaifeng Liuniao the representation of folk.
sentences.chinese: 開封遛鳥所具有的古都民俗的代表性分析。

sentences.english: Joined by Athens, Cairo and Rome as the worlds Top four Ancient Capitals.
sentences.chinese: 和雅典，開羅，羅馬並稱爲世界四大文明古都。

sentences.english: Heaven ancient capital, Damascus, mysterious and old.
sentences.chinese: 天國古都，大馬士革，神祕又古老。

sentences.english: Soft nationalism is centered in China's ancient capital of Nanjing.
sentences.chinese: 溫和的民族主義是集中於中國的古都南京。

sentences.english: Nanjing was a dynastic capital 10 times during its 2,500-year history.
sentences.chinese: 南京在其2500年的歷史中是一個十朝古都。

sentences.english: As the birthplace of the Chinese nation, Zhengzhou is one of the eight rge ancient capitals in China.
sentences.chinese: 作爲中華民族的發祥地，鄭州是中國八大古都之一。

sentences.english: Xi'an is one of the four major ancient civilization capitals, locating in the center of Guanzhong Plain.
sentences.chinese: 西安位於關中平原中部，是世界著名的文化古都之一。

sentences.english: The following tours are based at Cuzco, the site of the ancient capital of the Inca civilization.
sentences.chinese: 下面是建立在庫，旅遊地點的印加文明古都。

sentences.english: The business enterprise be located in thous all Xian, the outstanding personality ground work properly, the great talent constellate.
sentences.chinese: 企業座落在古都西安，人傑地靈，英才薈萃。

definition: provisional capital of a country (e.g. in time of war)/secondary capital/alternative capital
places of historic interest/historical sites/CL:個|个[ge4]

pinyin: Shi4 jie4 Wen2 hua4 Yi2 chan3

definition: Xi'an, sub-provincial city and capital of Shaanxi 陝西省|陕西省[Shan3 xi1 Sheng3] in northwest China/see 西安區|西安区[Xi1 an1 qu1]
the birthplace (of sth good)/the cradle (e.g. of art)
